precondition: The mouse cursor is hovering over an empty area of the Windows XP desktop.
A right-click context menu titled 'Arrange Icons By' is visible on the Windows XP desktop.
expected_results: The 'Display Properties' window will open, and the 'Themes' tab will be active.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Themes" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will display the "Screen Saver" settings. The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu, "Wait" time setting, and "Settings" button will become visible.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active.
action: Click the down arrow on the right side of the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: A dropdown list of available screen savers will appear.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active.
action: Click on any empty space within the 'Display Properties' window.
expected_results: A pop-up window titled 'Keep your computer up to date' will appear in the bottom left corner of the screen.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
action: Click the "Power..." button in the "Monitor power" section.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is currently selected.
action: Click the down arrow of the "Power schemes" dropdown menu.
expected_results: A list of available power schemes will be displayed.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Power schemes" dropdown menu should be visible.
action: Click the "Power schemes" dropdown menu and select "Presentation".
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will update to display the settings for the "Presentation" power scheme.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the dropdown button labeled "After 20 mins" next to the "Turn off monitor" option.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of time options for the monitor to turn off automatically.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open with the 'Always On' power scheme selected. The 'System hibernates' dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the 'Never' option in the 'System hibernates' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'System hibernates' dropdown menu will close. The system will now be set to never hibernate automatically.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power Schemes" tab selected. The "Always On" power scheme is selected, and the following settings are set to "Never": "Turn off monitor", "Turn off hard disks", "System standby", and "System hibernates".
expected_results: The changes to the power scheme settings will be applied.
The "Display Properties" window will display the "Screen Saver" settings.
